com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log
Class AndroidLogger

java.lang.Object
  com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log.AndroidLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public class AndroidLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger

The logger implementation for Android.

This implementation can be used when the code integrating the library runs environment with the Android runtime.

Since:
2007.12.23
Author:
Édouard Mercier
See Also:
LoggerFactory
